message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite low for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
